text: Dwight Evans (born May 16, 1954) is an American Democratic politician who has been a U.S. representative from Pennsylvania since 2016. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congressman Dwight Evans official U.S. House website * Dwight Evans for Congress official campaign website * * Pennsylvania House of Representatives – Dwight Evans official PA House website (1981–2016) Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Pennsylvania Category:Politicians from Philadelphia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dwight Evans (politician)
